---
title: MTM 2 CONTRACTING
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: mtm_2_contracting
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.0M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with MTM 2 CONTRACTING. The average
  contract duration was 1.15 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $926.7K.
  The longest contract was 3.52 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $1.8M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2019-2020'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '6'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '4'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '67%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '0%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.25'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '-2.8M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.15'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '926.7K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '3.52'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.8M'
---
